text: Hey Nico! Just a quick hello! How have you been? I am pretty happy, got two job offers this week! I have accepted one and I’ll be starting next week! In terms of tasks, it’ll be paint mostly then transitioning gradually to comp with time. I’m very excited to dive back and keep learning. What about you? Are you still loving your work as a senior compositor? What kind of things are working on these days? Take good care!
